scripts.install: cd server && npm i --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../client && npm i --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.clean: npm cache clean --force; rm -rfv node_modules; rm package-lock.json; cd server; npm cache clean --force; rm -rfv node_modules; rm package-lock.json; cd ../client; npm cache clean --force; rm -rfv node_modules; rm package-lock.json
scripts.test:ci: echo "Running all tests!" && npm run cover:ci
scripts.cover:all: npm run test:server; npm run test:client; npx codecov
scripts.test:server: cd server; ENV_TXT=$(cat env.txt) npm test
scripts.concurrently: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "cd server; npm start" "cd client; npm start"
